title: BroadcastChannel Removed v1.6.3.8-v5
details:
v1.6.3.8-v5 ARCHITECTURE CHANGE: BroadcastChannel completely removed from the extension.

REASON: BroadcastChannel doesn't work for Firefox sidebar/extension communication because:
1. Firefox Sidebar runs in separate origin context - BC messages never arrive
2. Cross-origin iframes cannot receive BC messages due to W3C spec origin isolation
3. Port-based messaging is more reliable and works across all contexts

NEW ARCHITECTURE:
- Layer 1a: runtime.Port for real-time metadata sync (PRIMARY)
- Layer 2: storage.local with revision versioning + storage.onChanged (FALLBACK)

FILES CHANGED:
- BroadcastChannelManager.js - Now exports NO-OP stubs only
- background.js - BC initialization converted to no-ops
- quick-tabs-manager.js - All BC code converted to no-ops
- storage-handlers.js - Tier tracking removed, fixed debounce

The stubs return false/null for backwards compatibility. All tests pass.
